description: With your dominant hand open, touch your forehead and move your hand away, palm facing out.
Touch your dominant open hand to your lips, then move your hand forward, palm up.
Place your dominant hand's fist (thumb up) on the palm of your open non-dominant hand. Move both hands upward together.
With your dominant hand, extend your index and middle fingers while keeping your other fingers tucked in. Tap these fingers against your thumb.
Shake your head horizontally while forrowing your eyebrows.
Form a fist with your dominant hand, palm facing in. Circle it over your heart.
Link the index fingers of both hands together, alternating their positions.
Cross your arms over your chest as if giving yourself a hug, with your hands forming fists.
With your dominant hand, extend your index and middle fingers. Tap these fingers twice onto the extended index finger of your non-dominant hand, which is held horizontally.
